items.name: The Night of the Scissors
items.detailed_description:
Encouraged by his friend, Adam decides to break into an abandoned post office for scrapping. Soon he will discover that a maniac wielding a pair of scissors and ready to kill is lurking around the place.

Will he find his way out?

AN UNEXPECTED CARDBOARD GUEST IS APPROACHING


Take control of Adam and run from the serial killer on this thrilling survival horror game inspired by VHS slasher movies from the 80s, experience once again the tank controls and the third person cinematic cameras formula that made the genre shine back in the PSX era.

  • Navigate through an abandoned post office, don't get caught by the snipper!
  • Be stealthy, hide inside of wardrobes, restroom stalls, and other places.
  • Authentic VHS experience with cinematic glitch cameras.
  • Optional third person game mode.
  • A perfect mix of calm atmosphere and sound effects, guaranteed tension.
  • Discover bits of a bigger plot.

Disclaimer: This game is a short experience that you can complete in around 40 minutes and it's meant for players 18 years old and over, it might also be too scary for some people. Keep this in mind before acquiring the product.

items.detailed_description:

(The total process is about 20 minutes, including two endings.)

- Game Features -
·Black and white hand-drawing, 70s style art.
·You have a Keeper with you.
·Find different clues by using your "Introspection".

- Reminder -
·This is not a game that full of vicious jumpscares, anyone can play it.
·Shout out to Octavi Navarro! I may can't get this far until your work inspired me!

This story is not complete yet. I can't really guarantee to make the next chapter, it depends on your feedback. This is the first game made by Lawsquare133. Thank you for your support.

Symmetry Lines is simple puzzle game with symmetry and lines.

The rule of this game is :
- just move the circle and position it in correct square.
- but you can't move circles directly.
- circles will move symmetrical to a line,
- and you will manipulate the line.

This game consists of 36 puzzles, and the level of difficulty increases gradually.
there are 12 Steam achievements.

Have fun with this game!

items.name: Project Crypt
items.detailed_description:
Project Crypt is an action-adventure horror game inspired by critically-acclaimed horror titles such as Cry of Fear. You play as a disturbed young individual trying to find a way out of a city filled with horrific enemies. Find out the truth of your past and make it out to safety alive!

Project Crypt is a game built on GZDoom, featuring action-packed combat encounters and creepy atmospheric areas in a variety of different environments. This world is a hostile place, so you will have to be careful, with managing your ammo supply and constantly be on the lookout for your health.

Photosensitivity warning: This video game contains scenes with flashing and flickering lights that may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Key Features:

  • Extensive single-player campaign
  • Multiple outcomes of the story depending on your actions in the game
  • Moody soundtrack to enhance the atmosphere
  • Robust inventory system to enhance the gameplay
  • A new survival-horror experience
  • Nostalgic visual style echoing back to the early 2000s

items.name: Abstract World
items.detailed_description:
In this game you play as a character who is experiencing life difficulties and trying to overcome them.

you play as a 2D character in the form of a square, who wanders through tunnels, passes through mazes, fights off enemies by shooting at them.

there are mechanics: you can not touch some walls so as not to die, touching special objects they make sounds of different musical instruments, shoot at the vrogs and kill them, but if they come close they will kill you.

The game is very abstract and executed from top to bottom.
Basically it's an adventure genre, but there are also elements of a shooter.
The game uses 2D graphics, there are also interesting game mechanics
that you will learn about at the very beginning and will use them as the game progresses.

This game is suitable for real gourmet gamers.

items.name: Sunset Mall - Classic
items.detailed_description:
IT IS HERE, THE ORIGINAL SUNSET MALL. FROM AN OLDER TIME.

If you think about it, it is probably more nostalgic to play this version than the newer ones because this itself is now very old...


An excerpt from the original Game Page

Inspiration:

Sunset Mall is a simple "Vaporwave" style adventure game situated in a 90's Shopping Mall, I took a lot of inspiration from "Mall Quest" when creating this.

"Mall Quest" has a similar style and objective but sadly the game is very hard to find online anymore.

About:
Explore a randomly generated mall in search of iconic 80's - 90's Music, Movies, Toys, Consoles and Games and enjoy the aesthetic style and music.
